Sentencas: Ba0.5Sr0.5Co1-xFexO3-delta (0.2 < x < 0.8) powders were synthesized using a wet chemical procedure starting from nitrates as precursors and citric acid and ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid as complexing agents.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Electrochemical Characteristics of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co1-xFexO3-δ Phases in Different Atmospheres

Sentencas: The structural properties and the electrochemical behavior of the materials were investigated as a function of temperature (T), atmosphere (air, oxygen, and hydrogen), and Fe content (x) using simultaneous thermogravimetric and differential thermal analysis, X-ray diffraction analysis, and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Electrochemical Characteristics of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co1-xFexO3-δ Phases in Different Atmospheres

Sentencas: Significant differences were observed in the crystalline structure of the Ba0.5Sr0.5Co1-xFexO3-delta samples when they were fired in different atmospheres (inert and air; oxidizing and reducing).
Titulo: Structural Properties and Electrochemical Characteristics of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co1-xFexO3-δ Phases in Different Atmospheres

Sentencas: The formation of a cubic-type single phase in the 0.2 and 0.8 Fe content (x) range was confirmed under oxidizing conditions.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Electrochemical Characteristics of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co1-xFexO3-δ Phases in Different Atmospheres

Sentencas: The unit cell volume increased with decreasing (x) and in more oxidizing atmospheres.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Electrochemical Characteristics of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co1-xFexO3-δ Phases in Different Atmospheres

Sentencas: Further structural transformation with the collapse of the cubic structure was observed with increasing Fe content (x) under reducing conditions.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Electrochemical Characteristics of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co1-xFexO3-δ Phases in Different Atmospheres

Sentencas: The cubic-type Ba0.5Sr0.5Co1-xFexO3-delta solid solutions were tested as electrodes on Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-x pellets in symmetrical cells.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Electrochemical Characteristics of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co1-xFexO3-δ Phases in Different Atmospheres

Sentencas: The lowest obtained values of area specific resistance were 0.56 for Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta in air and 0.25 cm(2) for Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta in oxygen atmosphere at 1073 K.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Electrochemical Characteristics of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co1-xFexO3-δ Phases in Different Atmospheres
